mapper.insert: insert into auth_code (uuid, code, resource_owner_uuid, client_uuid, access_request_uuid, expires_at) values ( #{authCode.uuid}, #{authCode.code}, #{authCode.resourceOwnerUUID}, #{authCode.clientUUID}, #{authCode.accessRequest.uuid}, #{authCode.expiresAt, typeHandler=org.rootservices.authorization.persistence.mapper.typehandler.OffsetDateTimeTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: select auth_code.uuid, auth_code.expires_at, auth_code.created_at, access_request.uuid as ar_uuid, access_request.redirect_uri as ar_redirect_uri, access_request.created_at as ar_created_at, scope.uuid as ar_scope_uuid, scope.name as ar_scope_name, scope.created_at as ar_scope_created_at from auth_code join access_request on access_request.uuid = auth_code.access_request_uuid left join access_request_scopes on access_request_scopes.access_request_uuid = access_request.uuid left join scope on scope.uuid = access_request_scopes.scope_uuid where access_request.client_uuid = #{clientUUID} and auth_code.code = decode(#{code}, 'escape') and auth_code.expires_at > current_timestamp
